trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other types to and from instances of a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represent an object's length.
trans-unit.target: 개체의 길이를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Double" />의 인스턴스와 다른 형식의 인스턴스를 상호 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> 다음 형식으로 변환 하도록 지원: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, 및 <xref:System.UInt64>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and use an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> object.
trans-unit.target: 만들고의 인스턴스를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A custom method called `ChangeLeft` is defined, which converts the content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> (defined in a separate [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] file) to an instance of <xref:System.Double>, and later into a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 메서드가 호출 `ChangeLeft` 정의 된의 콘텐츠를 변환 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> (별도 정의 된 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 파일)의 인스턴스로 <xref:System.Double>, 고 나중에 다시는 <xref:System.String>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method passes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> to a <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> object, which converts the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> to an instance of <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 전달는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> 에 <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> 을 변환 하는 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> 인스턴스에 <xref:System.Double>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Notice that this value has already been converted to a <xref:System.String> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 값으로 변환 된 이미 사라졌는지는 <xref:System.String> 를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.ToString%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: This value is then passed back to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.SetLeft%2A> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.GetLeft%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> in order to change the position of the `text1` object.
trans-unit.target: 이 값은 다음에 다시 전달 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.SetLeft%2A> 메서드 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.GetLeft%2A> 의 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> 의 위치를 변경 하기 위해는 `text1` 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.LengthConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.LengthConverter" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: 구성 요소에 대한 컨텍스트 정보를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the data type to evaluate for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 변환할 수 있는지 확인할 데이터 형식을 식별합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether conversion is possible from a specified type to a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents an object's length.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 형식을 개체의 길이를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Double" />로 변환할 수 있는지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if conversion is possible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 변환이 가능하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> 다음 형식으로 변환 하도록 지원: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, 및 <xref:System.UInt64>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: 구성 요소에 대한 컨텍스트 정보를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the data type to evaluate for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 변환할 수 있는지 확인할 데이터 형식을 식별합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether conversion is possible to a specified type from a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents an object's length.
trans-unit.target: 개체의 길이를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Double" />을 지정된 형식으로 변환할 수 있는지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if conversion to the <paramref name="destinationType" /> is possible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationType" />으로 변환할 수 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion of the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> 다음과 같은 형식의 변환만 지원: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, 및 <xref:System.UInt64>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: 구성 요소에 대한 컨텍스트 정보를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents culture-specific information that is maintained during a conversion.
trans-unit.target: 변환 도중 유지되는 문화권별 정보를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the object that is being converted to <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />로 변환되는 개체를 식별합니다.

trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other data types into instances of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represent an object's length.
trans-unit.target: 다른 데이터 형식의 인스턴스를 개체 길이를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Double" />의 인스턴스로 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that is the value of the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 변환 결과 값인 <see cref="T:System.Double" />의 인스턴스입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion of the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> 다음과 같은 형식의 변환만 지원: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" />가 <see langword="null" />인 경우

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="source" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not a valid type for conversion.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" />가 <see langword="null" />이 아니고 변환 가능한 형식이 아닌 경우

trans-unit.source: Describes context information of a component, such as its container and <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 컨테이너 및 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />와 같은 구성 요소의 컨텍스트 정보를 설명합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies culture-specific information, including the writing system and the calendar that is used.
trans-unit.target: 사용된 쓰기 시스템 및 달력을 비롯한 문화권별 정보를 식별합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is being converted.
trans-unit.target: 변환되는 <see cref="T:System.Object" />를 식별합니다.

trans-unit.source: The data type that this instance of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> is being converted to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />의 이 인스턴스가 변환되는 데이터 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: Converts other types into instances of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represent an object's length.
trans-unit.target: 다른 형식을 개체 길이를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Double" />의 인스턴스로 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the value of the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 변환 결과 값인 새 <see cref="T:System.Object" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />가 <see langword="null" />인 경우

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="value" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />, or the <paramref name="destinationType" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />가 <see langword="null" /> 또는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />가 아니거나, <paramref name="destinationType" />이 유효하지 않은 경우
